mapper.insert: insert into spt_bid (ID, BID_NO, MEMBER_NO, BIDDOC_NO, BID_TIME, BID_CONTENT, STATUS, BID_RESULT, HANDLER, DETAIL) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bidNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{biddocNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bidTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bidContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bidResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update spt_bid set BID_NO = #{bidNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIDDOC_NO = #{biddocNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BID_TIME = #{bidTime,jdbcType=DATE}, BID_CONTENT = #{bidContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BID_RESULT = #{bidResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDLER = #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAIL = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, BID_NO, MEMBER_NO, BIDDOC_NO, BID_TIME, BID_CONTENT, STATUS, BID_RESULT, HANDLER, DETAIL from spt_bid where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, BID_NO, MEMBER_NO, BIDDOC_NO, BID_TIME, BID_CONTENT, STATUS, BID_RESULT, HANDLER, DETAIL from spt_bid

select * from spt_bid where BID_NO LIKE #{bidNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and MEMBER_NO LIKE #{memberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and BIDDOC_NO LIKE #{biddocNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and BID_CONTENT LIKE #{bidContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS LIKE #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and BID_RESULT LIKE #{bidResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and HANDLER LIKE #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DETAIL LIKE #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
